Class ShipMatrixConfig

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.ship_board.helpers.ShipMatrixConfig
public class ShipMatrixConfig extends Object
This class defines the structure of the matrix for the ships used in the game (try level and level2)
